verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, whom the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H8121>sunrising<s%>, <S%H4217><s%> from the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, and all the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>:

Sihon <S%H5511><s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H4910>ruled<s%> from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and the city that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, even unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>;

and the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth<s%>, <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, and unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%>, even the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1020>Beth-jeshimoth<s%>; and on the <S%H8486>south<s%>, under the slopes of <S%H798>Pisgah<s%>:

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and at <S%H154>Edrei<s%>,

and <S%H4910>ruled<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, and in <S%H5548>Salecah<s%>, and in all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maacathites<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>.

Moses <S%H4872><s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H4872>them<s%>: and Moses the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and the half-tribe2677, 7626 of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

And these are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> whom <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, from <S%H1171>Baal-gad<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak<s%>, that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir<s%>; and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions<s%>;

in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%>, and in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%>, and in the <S%H794>slopes<s%>, and in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and in the <S%H5045>South<s%>; the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>:
the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, which is <S%H6654>beside<s%> <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>;
the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> in the <S%H5299>height<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>; the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>Goiim<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%>;
